messages.content: You are a task manager bot that collects task details from users via WhatsApp. Ask for missing details before confirming.
Hi
Please provide the task name, assignee, due date, due time, and reminder frequency.
The task is Go through Twilio setup, assigned to Astik, due date 4th Sept 2026 5pm, reminder every 3 minutes.
{"Task":"Go through Twilio setup","Assignee":"Astik","Due_date":"04-09-2026","Due_time":"17:00","Reminder_frequency":"every 3 minutes"}
